page.title: 06Toys for boys
page.content: There are toys for all ages of children. I have a cap gun and I.D. book from the program "V".{"V"}is a {science fiction}program about aliens who land on Earth who look like humans. Most of the shops sell {Starwars}figures from the film Starwars. I have 42 Starwars figures. Some of the shops sell Robo Machines or Transformers.{Robo Machines}and {Transformers}are{Robots}which change into cars, planes, motobikes, helicopters and submarines. Some of the shops sell Lego.{Lego}is plastic blocks which you can make things out of because the Lego fits together. Some of the shops sell{Action Force toys to go with the comic called Action Force. There are four teams called Z Force, SAS force, Q Force and Space Force against Red shadows.
